channel.title: history on Some technical engineer stuff
channel.description: Recent content in history on Some technical engineer stuff

item.title: And what about myself?
item.description: Past I have a degree in design and production of radio electronic equipment. I also graduated from MSU as a professional photojournalist. But i think it all began around ‘84 when could barely walk and found my father’s closet with tools and picked a screwdriver as my favorite tool. Also its my first uttered word at that time (of course it was in Russian). In case you are curious which screwdriver it was: it was slotted 0.6x3.5 mm. And since then I’d been disassembling all the things around me, most of the time without possibility to recover its original state. But things changed over time, I got some experience and started to assemble them back over time.
